thread.title: Mexican airport operator appoints new Chief Financial Officer
thread.title_full: Mexican airport operator appoints new Chief Financial Officer

author: eTN Editor
title: Mexican airport operator appoints new Chief Financial Officer
text:
Mexican airport operator appoints new Chief Financial Officer Adv: 
Jul 17, 2015 Adv: 
MONTERREY, Mexico - Mexican airport operator Grupo Aeroportuario del Centro Norte, S.A.B. de C.V., known as OMA, announced that its Board of Directors yesterday named a new Chief Financial Officer to succeed Jose Luis Guerrero, who has made a personal decision to leave the company to continue his development and professional career.
